participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and thoughtful, with a passion for knowledge.
participant_1.background: i read a book every week. i started a new job as a pa three months ago. i live with my husband in pennsylvania. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary.

participant_2.name: Paul
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, with a love for culture.
participant_2.background: i'm a descendant of christopher columbus. i love to cook paella. i'm an art major in college. i visit europe twice a year.

content.text: Yo! I like to read books on the weekends.
